mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO rpt_app_business_his (id,ip,file_name,file_level,file_business,`count`,data_time,`time`) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.ip}, #{item.fileName}, #{item.fileLevel}, #{item.fileBusiness}, #{item.count}, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(NOW(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT ip ip, file_name fileName, file_level fileLevel, GROUP_CONCAT(file_business) fileBusiness, sum( count ) count, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP time FROM ( SELECT ip, file_name, file_level, file_business, `count` FROM rpt_app_business_his WHERE data_time = DATE_FORMAT( date_sub( NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) UNION ALL SELECT ip, file_name, file_level, file_business, `count` count FROM rpt_app_business_total ) a GROUP BY ip, file_name
